languages.text: Портал, указанный Ноктюрном Забвения, привел Лорд-капитана на празднество друкари. Необходимо понять, почему Арлекин выбрал именно это место и зачем доставил сюда Вольного Торговца и е{mf|го|е} отряд.

The portal that Nocturne of Oblivion has directed the Lord Captain to has led {mf|him|her} to a Drukhari feast. The Rogue Trader must understand why the Harlequin has chosen this place as the portal's exit point.
languages.original_text: Портал, указанный Ноктюрном Забвения, привел Лорд-капитана на празднество друкари. Необходимо понять, почему Арлекин выбрал именно это место и зачем доставил сюда Вольного Торговца и е{mf|го|е} отряд.

traits.locale_text: The portal that Nocturne of Oblivion has directed the Lord Captain to has led {mf|him|her} to a Drukhari feast. It's necessary to understand why the Harlequin has chosen this place as the portal's exit point for the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} squad.

The portal that Nocturne of Oblivion has directed the Lord Captain to has led {mf|him|her} to a Drukhari feast. The Rogue Trader must understand why the Harlequin has chosen this place as the portal's exit point.

The portal that Nocturne of Oblivion has directed the Lord Captain to has led {mf|him|her} to a Drukhari feast. The Rogue Trader must understand why the Harlequin has chosen this place as the portal's exit point.

languages.text: Le portail indiqué par le Nocturne de l'Oubli a mené {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} à un festin drukhari. {mf|Il|Elle} doit déterminer pourquoi l'Arlequin a choisi cet endroit comme point de sortie.
languages.original_text: The portal that Nocturne of Oblivion has directed the Lord Captain to has led {mf|him|her} to a Drukhari feast. The Rogue Trader must understand why the Harlequin has chosen this place as the portal's exit point.

traits.locale_text: Le portail indiqué par le Nocturne de l'Oubli a mené {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} à un festin drukhari. {mf|Il|Elle} doit déterminer pourquoi l'arlequin a choisi cet endroit comme point de sortie.

languages.text: 根据遗忘夜曲的指引，行商浪人穿过了传送门，出现在了黑暗灵族的盛宴之中。现在，行商浪人必须弄清楚为什么那位丑角会把这里选作传送门的出口。
languages.original_text: The portal that Nocturne of Oblivion has directed the Lord Captain to has led {mf|him|her} to a Drukhari feast. The Rogue Trader must understand why the Harlequin has chosen this place as the portal's exit point.

traits.locale_text: 根据遗忘夜曲的指引，行商浪人穿过了传送门，出现在了黑暗灵族的盛宴之中。现在，行商浪人必须弄清楚为什么那位丑角会把这里选作传送门的出口。

languages.text: 忘却のノクターンがロード・キャプテンに指示したポータルで、デュカーリの饗宴に行き着いた。自由開拓者は、ハーレクィンがポータルの出口としてこの饗宴を選んだ理由を理解しなければならない。
languages.original_text: The portal that Nocturne of Oblivion has directed the Lord Captain to has led {mf|him|her} to a Drukhari feast. The Rogue Trader must understand why the Harlequin has chosen this place as the portal's exit point.

traits.locale_text: 忘却のノクターンがロード・キャプテンに指示したポータルで、デュカーリの饗宴に行き着いた。自由開拓者は、ハーレクィンがポータルの出口としてこの饗宴を選んだ理由を理解しなければならない。

languages.text: Das Portal, zu dem Nocturne des Nichts den Lord Captain gelotst hat, führte mitten in ein Drukhari-Festmahl. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss nun verstehen, warum der Harlekin ausgerechnet diesen Ort als Ausgang für das Portal gewählt hat.
languages.original_text: The portal that Nocturne of Oblivion has directed the Lord Captain to has led {mf|him|her} to a Drukhari feast. The Rogue Trader must understand why the Harlequin has chosen this place as the portal's exit point.

traits.locale_text: Das Portal, zu dem Nocturne des Nichts den Lord Captain gelotst hat, führte mitten in ein Drukhari-Festmahl. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss nun verstehen, warum der Harlekin ausgerechnet diesen Ort als Ausgang für das Portal gewählt hat.

languages.text: El portal al que Nocturno del Olvido ha guiado a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán lleva a un festín Drukhari. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe comprender por qué el Arlequín ha elegido este lugar como punto de salida del portal.
languages.original_text: The portal that Nocturne of Oblivion has directed the Lord Captain to has led {mf|him|her} to a Drukhari feast. The Rogue Trader must understand why the Harlequin has chosen this place as the portal's exit point.

traits.locale_text: El portal al que Nocturno del Olvido ha guiado a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán lleva a un festín Drukhari. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe comprender por qué el Arlequín ha elegido este lugar como punto de salida del portal.

languages.text: Nisyan Noktürnü'nün Lord Kaptan'ı yönlendirdiği portal, onu bir Drukhari ziyafetine götürdü. Hür Tacir, Arleken'in neden burayı portalın çıkış noktası olarak seçtiğini öğrenmeli.
languages.original_text: The portal that Nocturne of Oblivion has directed the Lord Captain to has led {mf|him|her} to a Drukhari feast. The Rogue Trader must understand why the Harlequin has chosen this place as the portal's exit point.
